db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [invalid-lint-directive] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: You used an invalid qmllint directive in a qmllint comment. This is probably due to a typo.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: The qmllint directive has no effect.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, correct the typo:

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: You used an unknown category in a qmllint directive inside a qmllint comment. This is probably due to a typo.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: The qmllint directive has no effect.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, correct the typo:
